mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_upload( file_no, group_no member_id, file_name, file_type, file_storage, upload_date )values( FILE_UPLOAD_SEQ_HWAN.nextval, #{groupNo}, #{memberId}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileStorage}, #{uploadDate} )

INSERT INTO board( board_no, board_title, member_id, category_big, category_small, board_content, board_img, board_acorn )values( BOARD_INSERT_SEQ_HWAN.nextval, #{boardTitle}, #{memberId}, #{categoryBig}, #{categorySmall}, #{boardContent}, #{boardImg}, #{boardAcorn} )
